channel.title: Diskspace and bandwidth (just an stab in the dark)
channel.description:
i was thinking, would anyone regester for my free hosting service if i offered this.
diskspace: 50mb Bandwidth: 500mb per month subdomain (domain yet to be brought) unlimited ftp account unlimited mysql database unlimited sub-domain unlimited pop3 email unlimited auto responder unlimited mailing list unlimited email forwarder php 5, perl, tcl, ssi, cgi
then somthing like an extra 50mb diskspace for £0.25 and bandwidth for 500mb or £0.25
would you like go for it? (this is just a stab in the dark to see if anyone would go for it).

item.title: Diskspace and bandwidth (just an stab in the dark)
item.dc:creator: @error.login cane
item.description:
@error.login wrote:

yeah of course not… i was going to get a cheap reseller ($1.50 per month lol) but yeah i cbaed looking for a better one but i might go with site5 or whatever it is called. but im of to bed laters.

Read full topic
item.source: Diskspace and bandwidth (just an stab in the dark)

item.title: Diskspace and bandwidth (just an stab in the dark)
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

[quote=“error.login, post:3, topic:173562”]yeah you use reseller?
edit/ 100gb why would anyone need that most users will only use like 100mb diskspace[/quote]
I did mean 10 Gb, but when you can get a better thing on a reseller why buy from you.
Yes 0.25 £ is not much but you can still get much better easier.

Read full topic

item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

What, that is little.

Why don’t more Bandwidth and diskspace?

I have a Free Hoosting site:

10000 mb bandwidth and 300 mb diskspace.
With much of the other thing you offer.
